Kod Gemisi Open Source

We belive in Open Source culture. As a company who uses open source software heavily we open source out internal libraries and applications.

spring-plugin

spring-boot-better-error-pages

Rails like error pages for Spring Boot applications that are only active in development
Github Demo
library

Servlet Url Mapper

A library helps to use multiple different URLs with one Servlet with ease.
Github
library

Java PDF Generation Library

A library that helps developer to easily create PDF files with java programatically. It is a wrapper for puppeteer.
Bitbucket
spring-plugin

specification-builder

A tiny library that helps developers to build and combine complex specifications together with Spring Data JPA.
Github
library

java-virus-scanner

A programmatic virus scanner that helps you to scan any file uploaded to your app, programmatically.
Github
library

database-resource-bundle

This is an implementation of database backend for ResourceBundle. Easily store your properties on db
Github
spring-plugin

database-resource-bundle-message-source-starter

Spring starter for database resource bundle. Plug&play database backend for your properties
